last_episode_to_air.name: Our DRAMA
last_episode_to_air.overview: Joo-young prepares a secret special event for Ja-rim but things seemingly do not go as he planned.

name: Love Revolution
overview: It's a new concept of comedy romance that captures teenage romance, friendship and dreams centered on a cute and lovely couple who fell in love with Wang Ja-rim, the goddess of information.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Gong Joo-young forgets his wallet on the first day of school and can’t take the bus. A female student helps him pay the fare when he is at his wit’s end. He then falls in love with the girl at first sight but not getting any response when he tries all sorts of ways to pursue her. Even so, Goo Jooyoung doesn’t feel demotivated... And this leads to a romantic comedy!

episodes.name: A Princess and a Prince... We are Destined for Each Other?
episodes.overview: On the first day of school, high school freshman Joo-young falls deeply in love at first sight with the pretty but aloof Ja-rim and thinks they are destined for one another.

episodes.name: Love Is... All About Timing
episodes.overview: Joo-young surprises Ja-rim with loads of lollipops on White Day. Ja-rim gets annoyed as Joo-young keeps on following her and asking for her number.

episodes.name: What Happened on the Day of the Retreat
episodes.overview: Joo-young, Kyung-woo and Byung-hoon prepare for a dance number at the school retreat talent show. When students arrive at the retreat's venue, Joo-young suddenly goes missing.

episodes.name: The Confession at the Retreat
episodes.overview: Joo-young publicly confesses to Ja-rim at the talent show.

episodes.name: Don't Sympathize With Me
episodes.overview: Joo-young overhears Ja-rim telling her friends she went along with Joo-young's public confession because she pitied him. Hurt by her words, Joo-young keeps on whining to his friends not to pity him.

episodes.name: The Outcome of a "Let's Date" on Rose Day
episodes.overview: Joo-young decides to formally confess to Ja-rim and ask her to be his girlfriend on Rose Day. A female senior tries to stop Joo-young from going out with Ja-rim.

episodes.name: They Say Your Grades Fall When You Start Dating
episodes.overview: Joo-young is in ecstasy when Ja-rim finally accepts him as her boyfriend, but she remains as cold as before. Ja-rim flat out rejects Joo-young's date plans and reminds him of their upcoming exams.

episodes.name: Sadness Accumulated. Are We Dating?
episodes.overview: Joo-young manages to get angry at Ja-rim and complains for being treated so badly.

episodes.name: An Unexpected Date, An Unexpected Party
episodes.overview: Kyung-woo's friends discover that he is working in a café and is popular among female customers. They pay him a visit one day, unknowing that it is Byung-hoon's birthday. Byung-hoon innocently assumes they are preparing a surprise for him.

episodes.name: What Happened in the Valley
episodes.overview: Joo-young, Ja-rim and their friends go on a trip to Byung-hoon's countryside home. When they get thirsty while harvesting chilies, Joo-young goes to fetch water but returns drunk after not being able to stop himself from drinking alcohol.

episodes.name: Valley Trip Where The Thumb Flows
episodes.overview: Before going home, Joo-young, Ja-rim and their friends clean Byung-hoon's grandparents' house and have fun for the last time. Ja-rim tries to make hangover soup for Joo-young.

episodes.name: Happy Joo-young Day
episodes.overview: Joo-young goes out for a date with Ja-rim, who is unknowing that it is Joo-young's birthday.

episodes.name: Humidity at 99%, A Bad Feeling
episodes.overview: Joo-young asks Ja-rim to cheer for him in a recreational basketball match with Jung-woo. Ja-rim meets Jung-woo and runs away in surprise. A misunderstanding ensues and Ja-rim finds it hard to explain to Joo-young the truth of her past with Jung-woo.

episodes.name: It's Sunny After The Rain. We Need To Talk
episodes.overview: Joo-young receives a call from Min-ji. The day after, Joo-young goes to play basketball with Jung-woo in casual attire and behaving strangely.

episodes.name: Save Every Little Bit to Love Ja-rim: Discount Date
episodes.overview: Joo-young has an upcoming weekend date with Ja-rim but he discovers that his allowance is running out.

episodes.name: Festival
episodes.overview: In the school festival, Class 1-3 becomes a customer magnet with their café and picture taking with the most famous students of their class, Kyung-woo and Ja-rim. Byung-hoon, Joo-young and their classmates carries out a hilarious plan to steal Class 1-3's customers and save Class 1-2's face.

episodes.name: Kyung-woo Is Missing
episodes.overview: After an encounter with middle school acquaintances, Kyung-woo suddenly goes missing for two days. He returns to school but has become hostile to Joo-young. To find out what could have happened to him, Joo-young and the remaining friends talk about Kyung-woo and Joo-young's middle school past.

episodes.name: Kyung-woo's Story
episodes.overview: Kyung-woo realizes he mistakenly thought Joo-young betrayed him by spilling the truth of his long bangs. He reflects on their friendship and apologizes to him.

episodes.name: Shy Boy
episodes.overview: Ja-rim accidentally sees Joo-young naked. Joo-young becomes embarrassed and stays away from Ja-rim. Kyung-woo starts having feelings for Ja-rim but he goes to hang out with Ye-seul instead.

episodes.name: When Kyung-woo Studies
episodes.overview: Class 1-3 remains in last place during exams because of Kyung-woo's low scores owing to his laziness in studying. Kyung-woo's friends and the entire Class 1-3 force him to study in order to save the class' face.

episodes.name: How Tall Are You?
episodes.overview: Joo-young, the shortest among their circle of friends, notices Ja-rim's growth spurt and worries she might overtake him. He scrambles to gain height by doing all sorts of exercises and eating height-related foods.

episodes.name: Ah-ram's Fleeting Glory
episodes.overview: The students of Isam Information High School become hooked to playing milk caps (ttakji) using chicken coupons. Ah-ram gets the hang of it and begins to take the lead. Tasting glory, she challenges Kyung-woo, who has defeated many of his peers, to a match.

episodes.name: Double Date's Temperature Difference
episodes.overview: Joo-young ponders about having little "skinship" with Ja-rim compared to other couples. Kyung-woo's relationship with Ye-seul is put to the test when they go to a double date with Joo-young and Ja-rim at Lotte World.

episodes.name: The Lunch From Your Nightmares
episodes.overview: The cafeteria is under emergency repairs, so Ja-rim decides to pack lunch for her and Joo-young despite being a lamentable cook. Min-ji goes out with her admirer Sang-hoon, but she learns later on that her crush Kyung-woo has broken up with Ye-seul.

episodes.name: If You Study, Your Future Spouse Will Change
episodes.overview: Fearing his mother's wrath, Byung-hoon decides to skip playing games and study for the exams, but his attention is diverted when she meets and gets attracted to a pretty college girl at the library. Ji-soo confesses his feelings to Ah-ram.

episodes.name: Room Party, Truth Game
episodes.overview: Joo-young's grades dropped, prompting his mother to tell him to move out from his apartment and live with his parents once again. His friends decide to hold a send off party for Joo-young.

episodes.name: A Ghost Story in Isam Information High School
episodes.overview: All Grade 11 students are mandated to retake an exam and Classes 1-2 and 1-3, the last to take the exam, have to stay until nightfall. After the exam, Jin-hee suggests playing an item retrieval game among the friends to test their courage, much to scaredy-cat Kyung-woo's worry.

episodes.name: Guilty Conscience
episodes.overview: Joo-young starts receiving text messages from his ex-girlfriend Bo-kyung, unknowing of her ulterior motives. As he gets worried that Ja-rim will know about it and misunderstand him, Joo-young runs into Bo-kyung while he is with Ja-rim. Soon, he notices that Ja-rim is not getting angry with him and has started to treat him nicely.

episodes.name: Me to You, You to Me
episodes.overview: Kyung-woo reveals to Ja-rim the truth about Bo-kyung. Ja-rim decides to deal with the situation herself and confronts Bo-kyung, much to Joo-young's shock.

episodes.name: Our DRAMA
episodes.overview: Joo-young prepares a secret special event for Ja-rim but things seemingly do not go as he planned.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Gong Joo-young forgets his wallet on the first day of school and can’t take the bus. A female student helps him pay the fare when he is at his wit’s end. He then falls in love with the girl at first sight but not getting any response when he tries all sorts of ways to pursue her. Even so, Goo Jooyoung doesn’t feel demotivated... And this leads to a romantic comedy!
